changelog.release_notes: error correction and new design of config page
correction of battery status at charging ... '-1%' -> '---'

update ... configurable options: visibility second hand (tree modes) / battery level in %
configurable options: - calendar week type (ISO, US, first Monday) - show low battery (thin circle) / charge symbol (filled circle) (yes, no) - limit for low battery (10%, 20%, 30%) - date order and delimiter only Pebble Time: - second hand color (red, black) description: - minute / hour hand are accurate to the second - white border around each hand - code to keep hands wide constant
